title: Index JSON for the mSCAPE viral alignment database

database_descriptions.viral_alignment_db: An index of viral assemblies used in the mSCAPE viral alignment database.

0.1.0.description: Initial release of the viral alignment database index.
0.1.0.methods_summary: Database constructed from NCBI RefSeq viral genomes (on date 2025-09-29). Sequence taxa were matched to the NCBI taxonomy (version 2023-10-01). Database was constructed with 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CLIMB-TRE/zeus/refs/heads/main/database_creator.py'

0.2.0.description: Second release of viral alignment database index with minor updates. Specifically improved fuzzy matching algorithm for organism names.
0.2.0.methods_summary: Database constructed from NCBI RefSeq viral genomes (on date 2025-09-29). Sequence taxa were matched to the NCBI taxonomy (version 2023-10-01). Database was constructed with 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CLIMB-TRE/zeus/refs/heads/main/database_creator.py'
